argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pcmpt.1 | |- F = ( n e. NN |-> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) ) |
| 2 |  | pcmpt.2 | |- ( ph -> A. n e. Prime A e. NN0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_pm2.27 | |- ( n e. Prime -> ( ( n e. Prime -> A e. NN0 ) -> A e. NN0 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( n e. Prime -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) = ( n ^ A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( n e. Prime /\ A e. NN0 ) -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) = ( n ^ A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_prmnn | |- ( n e. Prime -> n e. NN ) |
| 7 |  | #P_nnexpcl | |- ( ( n e. NN /\ A e. NN0 ) -> ( n ^ A ) e. NN ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( n e. Prime /\ A e. NN0 ) -> ( n ^ A ) e. NN ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( n e. Prime /\ A e. NN0 ) -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ex | |- ( n e. Prime -> ( A e. NN0 -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_syld | |- ( n e. Prime -> ( ( n e. Prime -> A e. NN0 ) -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_iffalse | |- ( -. n e. Prime -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) = 1 ) |
| 13 |  | #P_1nn | |- 1 e. NN |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( -. n e. Prime -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1d | |- ( -. n e. Prime -> ( ( n e. Prime -> A e. NN0 ) -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 15 | #P_pm2.61i | |- ( ( n e. Prime -> A e. NN0 ) -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_a1d | |- ( ( n e. Prime -> A e. NN0 ) -> ( n e. NN -> if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_ralimi2 | |- ( A. n e. Prime A e. NN0 -> A. n e. NN if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 19 | 2, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A. n e. NN if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 20 | 1 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. n e. NN if ( n e. Prime , ( n ^ A ) , 1 ) e. NN <-> F : NN --> NN ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F : NN --> NN ) |
| 22 |  | #P_nnuz | |- NN = ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) |
| 23 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( ph -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 24 | 21 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN ) -> ( F ` k ) e. NN ) |
| 25 |  | #P_nnmulcl | |- ( ( k e. NN /\ p e. NN ) -> ( k x. p ) e. NN ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. NN /\ p e. NN ) ) -> ( k x. p ) e. NN ) |
| 27 | 22, 23, 24, 26 | #P_seqf | |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( x. , F ) : NN --> NN ) |
| 28 | 21, 27 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( F : NN --> NN /\ seq 1 ( x. , F ) : NN --> NN ) ) |
